// deno-lint-ignore-file no-var

interface Foo {
  protoPropA: string;
  protoFuncA(a: number): number;
  protoFuncA(a: number, b?: number): number;
}

interface FooConstructor {
  new (a: string): Foo;
  (a: string): Foo;
  staticPropA: string;
  staticFuncA(b: number): number;
}

declare var Foo: FooConstructor;

interface Foo {
  protoPropB: string;
  protoFuncB(b: number): number;
}

interface FooConstructor {
  staticPropB: string;
  staticFuncB(b: number): number;
}
